description:
Machine Learning Engineer - ABC Technologies
Machine Learning Engineer
Company: ABC Technologies
Location: Remote
About the Role
We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer with experience in Python,
SQL, Pandas, and Scikit-learn. You will build ML pipelines and deploy models.
Requirements
2+ years of experience in Machine Learning
Strong Python programming skills
Experience with TensorFlow or PyTorch
Knowledge of SQL and data manipulation with Pandas
Understanding of ML algorithms and Scikit-learn
Experience deploying ML models to production
Nice to Have
Experience with AWS or Azure
Docker and Kubernetes knowledge
Deep Learning experience
What You'll Do
- Build and maintain ML pipelines
- Develop predictive models
- Collaborate with data scientists and engineers
- Deploy models to production
- Monitor model performance and retrain as needed
